comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: "Ethel Barrymore (August 15, 1879 – June 18, 1959) was an American actress and a member of the Barrymore family of actors.[1] [2]" en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ethel_Barrymore Sister of actors John and Lionel Barrymore, considered by some the best actress of her generation. On October 19, 1915, she opened in the title role of Edna Ferber's "Our Mrs. McChesney" at the Lyceum Theater on Broadway. ibdb.com/production.php?id=8224
